name: Spiral Spire
description:
Spiral Spire is a puzzle game without control over the player character, and with levels getting faster and more frantic the longer you take. 

The player will constantly move forward, unless confronted with a wall, which will result in them picking a random new direction to move in, as well as move faster.

Be careful not to get hit by spikes...

The game features 8 levels.

Controls:

Q and E to rotate the level

Made in 48hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam by 2 artists who tried their hardest to code.

Credits:
Art & Code: James Bennett & Francis Jones
SFX: bfxr.net
Music: The Black by Rolemusic
Fonts: Terminal Grotesque Font Family & Manaspace
